list_definition.definition: a strainer or other device through which liquid, gas, smoke etc can pass, but not solid material

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A filter is used to make sure that the oil is clean and does not contain any dirt

list_definition.definition: a kind of screening plate used to change or correct certain colours/colors

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: If you are taking photographs in sun and snow, you should use a blue filter.

list_definition.definition: (of liquids) to (become) clean by passing through a filter

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The rainwater filtered into a tank.

list_definition.mean_english: lọt ra; tiết lộ ra; thấm
list_definition.definition: to come bit by bit or gradually

The radiance of each beam could be varied by the insertion of fixed or variable neutral density filters.
